name: Mouse Dots
description:
Welcome to Mouse Dots, a physics based simulation where dots follow your mouse.

Exciting and Exhilarating  features include:

  • Spawn in dots! (wow)
  • Destroy dots! (amazing)
  • Change the dot's speed! (10/10 would use again)
  • Access the settings menu, where you can change the colors of the background, UI, and dots! (3 in 1, that's a steal!)
  • More features coming soon! (why?)

Can you believe it took only about 50 hours of my life? hA̶̝̓̌̀̚hḦ̸̲̆̅̀̉̊͋̀͝AHḥ̴͍̠̝͓́͑̋͘ą̸͎̠̗̈́̈̓̄̒̎͘͜͝͝Ḧ̸̲̆̅̀̉̊͋̀͝Ạ̷̭̼̦͔̼̑͌HA̷̗̟̙̋ḩ̸̛̙̮̱̟̠̻͑͝ạ̴͈̻̦͉̺͚̼̹͑͂̐͝

So what are you waiting for? Download Mouse Dots on your computer today for completely free and sign up with my code to get 50 silver coi-

(Pro tip: you can use Wallpaper Engine with this program (in fact, it was originally designed for it, although  it isn't a necessity). Instructions for Wallpaper Engine are in the readme.txt file)
